greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the total number of cliques of size k in all partitions of all positive integers <= n.
comment: Column k gives the partial sums of the k-th column of triangle A197126.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..150, flattened
formula: Sum_{k=1..n} k * T(n,k) = A284870(n). - _Alois P. Heinz_, May 14 2018
maple: b:= proc(n, p, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, [1, 0], `if`(p<1, [0, 0],
seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..20);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 27 2018
mathematica: Table[Table[T[n, k], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, 20}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 07 2019, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 04 2018
